recommendations: Adopt a calorie-controlled diet to promote weight loss.
Emphasize whole, nutrient-dense foods and limit processed foods.
Include a mix of lean protein, whole grains, fruits, and vegetables.
Monitor portion sizes and practice mindful eating.
Incorporate regular physical activity into your routine.
Stay hydrated with water and limit sugary beverages.
Consult with a healthcare professional or dietitian for personalized advice.

foods: Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens and vinaigrette dressing
Baked salmon with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli
